description: 1989年 冷戦 末期 MI 6 諜報員 ロレーン・ブロートン 世界 運命 握る 最高 機密 リスト 奪還 裏切り者 二重スパイ サッチェル 見つけ出す 極秘 ミッション 受け ベルリン 潜入 世界中 スパイ リスト 狙い 真実 嘘 敵 味方 わから 究極 状況下 果たして ロレーン 世界 運命 ――.

Atomic Blonde was directed by David Leitch well known for directing John Wick and stars Charlize Theron and James McAvoy. The story is set in 1989 when the Berlin Wall is about to fall The most elite spy in MI 6 Lorraine Broughton played by Charlize is dispatched to Berlin to destroy a mysterious organisation that killed an MI 6 s espionage on a mission and retrieve a list of double agents and take down a ruthless espionage ring There she teams up with David Percival an eccentric Berlin station chief to navigate her through the deadliest game of spies. Living in Australia where so many new films have been coming out these days I always go to the movies to see and review every single film which has yet to be out in Japan unfortunately I really enjoyed John Wick which may be one of my favourite action films I have yet to see the chapter 2 though So I d been wanting to watch this film since I came here Not sure why the story takes place in 1980 s though Apart from that Charlize is such an powerful and energetic actress always fighting and killing henchmen never been killed by any of them on screen James usually has his head shaved on screen like X men and Split as well as Atomic Blonde haha he is sometimes a good guy but sometimes bad or should I say naughty boy Tons of blood and bodies are seen so that an old lady sitting next to me was shivering and sometimes screaming every time someone is killed or getting killed anyway enjoy the film at theatres.
